description.value:
Your adventures have earned you special training in a particular field. Check the box next to one of the following options and cross the other off your Chronicle Sheet.

□ Poisoner Training You have been trained in rare poisoning techniques and have access to the following feats: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Deadly Poison Weapon]{Deadly Poison Weapons}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Pesh Skin]{Pesh Skin}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Shaped Contaminant]{Shaped Contaminant}.

□ Zephyr Guard Membership You are a member of the Zephyr Guard and gain access to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.KORSADviZaSccs2W]{Zephyr Guard} archetype and its associated feats.
